Title: Maduro asks the chavista National Assembly to work on a law that ...
Description: Maduro asks the chavista National Assembly to work on a law that -ends- the lies of candidates in electionsPresident Nicolás Maduro asked the 2020 National Assembly on December 18 to work on drafting a law that paves the way to ending -lies- in politics. Title: Saab announces 179 -alternative measures- for those arrested in p...
Description: Saab announces 179 -alternative measures- for those arrested in post-election protestsThe Public Prosecutor's Office announced in a statement on Monday that between December 10 and 14, the Judiciary approved 179 revisions of measures for defendants related to the -acts of violence- that broke out after the presidential elections on July 28.In this regard, the agency explained that these releases are added to the 354 measures previously requested and agreed upon, for a total of 533 carried out.

Title: María Corina Machado: -The end of the regime is much closer than ...
Description: María Corina Machado: -The end of the regime is much closer than many imagine-Opposition leader María Corina Machado reiterated her call on Venezuelans to be -alert- to -the signs- and prepared to -do what needs to be done at the right time- to achieve the change that the majority of the country voted for in the presidential elections of July 28.-The end of this regime in Venezuela is much closer than many imagine. We are one step away from that long-awaited change, a step that we still have to take. And that is why I repeat, let us be alert, listen to the signs, prepare our hearts, minds and bodies to do what needs to be done at the right time. There is very little left to do now,- he said in an audio message broadcast on his social networks.

Title: Vente Venezuela denounces forced disappearance of opposition lead...
Description: Vente Venezuela denounces forced disappearance of opposition leader Luis Palocz in ChacaoAccording to the Vente Venezuela human rights commission, Luis Palocz was detained by hooded individuals on Galarraga Avenue and El Samán in the Chacao municipality on Saturday, December 14 at 1:20 p.m.Luis Palocz is the second member of the Command with Venezuela to be the victim of forced disappearance in the same week. The first is Jesús Armas, who was detained under similar conditions on Tuesday, December 10, while leaving a café in Las Mercedes in the Baruta municipality.

Title: 🇻🇪🇦🇷Argentine gendarme accused of -espionage- has reportedly ...
Description: 🇻🇪🇦🇷Argentine gendarme accused of -espionage- has reportedly been transferred to El HelicoideArgentine Security Minister Patricia Bullrich said on Sunday that, according to information received by Venezuelan intelligence agencies, the Argentine gendarme detained in Táchira, Nahuel Agustín Gallo, had been transferred from the border state to El Helicoide, in Caracas.According to the Argentine newspaper El Clarín, the 27-year-old official has been in detention for the first week and has been transferred to a jail for political prisoners.Gallo was on regular leave to visit his partner, Silvia Gómez, and his two-year-old son, who were waiting for him in Caracas.

Title: Situation reported in El Rodeo 1: political prisoners scream for ...

Title: ⚠️Political prisoner dies in Tocuyito prison Una Ventana a la Lib...
Description: ⚠️Political prisoner dies in Tocuyito prisonUna Ventana a la Libertad reported that Jesús Rafael Álvarez, one of the political prisoners who are held in the Carabobo Penitentiary Complex (Tocuyito prison), located in the Libertador municipality. Carabobo state, died on Thursday, December 12, 2024 for reasons that are still unknown.-According to unofficial sources, the prisoner who died in the custody of the Venezuelan State was a native of the town of Anaco, Anzoátegui state, eastern Venezuela. Álvarez died yesterday at an undetermined time, for reasons that are currently unknown.-

Title: Four of the seven teenagers detained post-election are released F...
Description: Four of the seven teenagers detained post-election are releasedFour of the seven teenagers held in the Casa de Justicia 431 detention center located in El Cementerio, Caracas, were released after 11:00 PM on Wednesday, December 11.The release of the young men who are still detained will take place between Thursday and Friday, according to other relatives who said they were paying attention because they did not see their children leave the House of Justice that night.

Title: US warns Maduro that his -deadline- is 10E: -If he stays, there w...
Description: US warns Maduro that his -deadline- is 10E: -If he stays, there will be worse things--January 10, 2025 is the deadline for Nicolás Maduro. If he does not recognize the victory of President-elect Edmundo González before that date and does not begin the transition process on January 10, it will become a limit for him,- warned the United States ambassador to Venezuela, Francisco Palmieri, in an interview with El Nacional.Palmieri said that if Maduro steals the elections, the United States will impose new sanctions against his regime.

Title: Maduro's Government formalizes reestablishment of -cooperation- w...
Description: Maduro's Government formalizes reestablishment of -cooperation- with the UN office for human rights.The Maduro government announced on Tuesday that it has officially reestablished cooperation with the UN Human Rights office in Venezuela, after announcing its expulsion at the beginning of the year.In the framework of the International Human Rights Day, the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Yván Gil, assured in a statement that they reaffirm -their firm commitment to the promotion, protection and enjoyment of all human rights.--Venezuela calls on the international community to respect the principles contained in this valuable international declaration and to avoid exploiting the noble cause of human rights for political ends, an action that has caused immense harm to humanity,- the statement said.

Title: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken confirmed on Wednesday that ...
Description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken confirmed on Wednesday that the cancellation of oil licenses that allow transnational companies to do business with PDVSA to extract Venezuelan oil is -on the table.--Everything is on the table right now, including in terms of licensing,- Blinken said during a House Foreign Affairs Committee hearing.

Title: Maduro calls for progress in the creation of armed peasant combat...
Description: Maduro calls for progress in the creation of armed peasant combat bodiesOn Tuesday, December 10, President Nicolás Maduro asked the Bolivarian Militia to move forward with the creation of -armed combat corps- of farmers and fishermen.-I want us to go one step further, Commander of the Bolivarian Militia (MG Orlando Romero), we have to advance much further in the creation of the national peasant militia, the national militia of fishermen and the armed combat bodies of peasants, fishermen and fisherwomen,- said Maduro from the Miraflores Palace.

Title: UCV Workers: Government has money to raise minimum wage to $200 F...
Description: UCV Workers: Government has money to raise minimum wage to $200Faced with the precariousness of wages and working conditions, university professors, workers and other employees of the UCV announced that in 2025 they will continue to take to the streets to denounce all the abuses of which they are victims: -We confirm that, starting in 2025, we will fight, as it should be, in the streets with our rights.--There is nothing sadder than this Christmas because our end-of-year bonus is almost 80% less than what we received in 2022 and to top it off, they paid us in installments and at a devalued rate.-
